title: Meteoran (monster)
data:
{{version030}}
''This page is about the monster. For the player [[species]], see [[Meteoran]].''
{{monster info|meteoran}}

==Useful Info==
'''Meteorae''' are celestial creatures not native to the Dungeon. If you see one, then it's either part of a player-themed [[vault]], or a [[shapeshifter (monster)|shapeshifter]].

==Tips & Tricks==
None needed.

==History==
*Meteorae were added along with the player species in [[0.29]].
